channel.title: Nice lights
channel.description:
Well as I know I've wanted to post this for ages and I'm saving it for now...
Do you lie lights?
[b]I DO![/b]
Do you want to see them?
[b]YES PLEASE[/b]
Ok lets add some music to it, first listen to this:
[url=http://www.keaton-world.com/music/Funtastic_Power_-_300_This_is_Sparta_EXTENDED_mix.mp3] MUSIC [/url]
Ok? You like, not really but its old news, now you've listened to that run the script below (SCAR divi) Once you've run it you should see the disco, (the script was made by yakman) set up the music... put it on full volume and then bring the speakers next to your ears and well enjoy!!!
Anyone wanna try, tis good...
^_^ 1000th post... :)
